name: Long Nights
description:
A tired space cabbie ferries her last passenger for the day... with an unexpected result. 

Do you like aliens? Do you like flirting with aliens? Do you like SEXY ALIENS?

Then this is the game for YOU!

------------------------------------

A short alien otome game. 

Walkthrough is available on my tumblr. Feedback is welcome!

* This game contains instances of violence. Player discretion advised.

My tumblr: https://wattonot.tumblr.com
